alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 2:01PM PST until January 13 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning along the base of the Blue Mountains, southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. For the Wind Advisory along the base of the Blue Mountains, southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts of 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 7 PM PST this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
